name: Trolley Problem, Inc.
storyline: Trolley Problem, Inc. is a darkly comedic narrative game based on real-world philosophical papers, in which you are asked to make a series of impossible choices from two awful answers. Wrestle with your moral compass, decide the fate of millions – and compare your choices with the rest of the world.
summary: In The Trolley Company, players are pitted against many philosophical questions, varying from well known in pop culture to cutting edge AI, even those only found in textbooks, packaged in a comical and thought-provoking journey.
